thread.title: T20I centurion Rohit Sharma joins Suresh Raina in India's elite list
thread.title_full: T20I centurion Rohit Sharma joins Suresh Raina in India's elite list

title: T20I centurion Rohit Sharma joins Suresh Raina in India's elite list
text:
Recent Match Played: India won by 77 runs 
The 28-year-old Rohit, with this knock, became only the 2nd Indian batsman to register a three-figure mark in T20Is. The first was Raina (101) against the same opposition in 2010. 
Now, both the 28-year-olds - Rohit and Raina are India's only centurions across all 3 formats (Test, One Day International and T20I). 
Raina has 1 Test, 5 ODI and 1 T20I centuries while Rohit has 2 Test, 7 ODI and 1 T20I hundreds. Rohit, the right-hander from Mumbai, also holds the world record for he highest ODI score - 264.
